meanings.definition: A pre-designed format or layout used as a guide for creating something.
meanings.sent1: She used templates to design her presentation slides quickly.
meanings.sent2: Graphic designers often use templates to save time on projects.
meanings.sent3: The teacher joked that even the aliens in the textbook followed the templates.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a maze of templates, each leading to a different idea.
meanings.sent5: The templates acted as a roadmap for the project, ensuring everything was in place.

meanings.definition: A pattern or mold used for shaping something.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used templates to cut out the perfect shape for the table.
meanings.sent2: The artist created intricate templates for the pottery designs.
meanings.sent3: The child pretended the sandcastle molds were magical templates.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like templates, shaping her perception of the world.
meanings.sent5: The templates in his workshop allowed for precise woodworking.

meanings.definition: A model or example that can be copied or adapted.
meanings.sent1: The company provided templates for writing professional emails.
meanings.sent2: Students can use templates to structure their essays effectively.
meanings.sent3: The chef playfully called the recipe cards his cooking templates.
meanings.sent4: His life seemed to follow the templates of a classic novel.
meanings.sent5: The templates served as a foundation for creativity in the art class.
